text: The men's C-1 1000 metres competition of the canoeing event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 6 June 2015 at the Marina Channel in Singapore. ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! title: Canoeing at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's C-1 1000 metres
